title.rendered: Tower Holdings Join Alutech for New American Venture

content.rendered:
Kevin O’Sullivan, CEO & President of Tower Holdings Group recently hosted Reinhold Tegischer, Technical Director and Dean Cordon, General Manager, Aluminum Division of Alutech Aluminium And Glass for a series of internal planning and client meetings. The group was joined by Liam Ó Súilleabháin, Director of Operations, Alubuild Ireland.

Tower Holdings Group, a worldwide-leading developer, construction manager, contractor and materials supplier, recently launched Alutech North America to exclusively market and distribute Alutech’s industry-leading, façade systems and products. Under the new partnership, Tower Holdings will offer a full range of Alutech products and installation services for some of the most advanced curtain wall and façade solutions in the world. The exclusive agreement includes the United States, Canada and Mexico.
